name: Vegetable Oil
description: Neutral oil used for cooking and frying.

name: Coconut Milk
description: Creamy liquid from coconut flesh, adds a rich, tropical flavor.

name: Pork Belly
description: Rich cut from the underside of the pig, known for its tender texture.

name: Chicken
description: Versatile poultry meat with a mild flavor, popular worldwide.

name: Pork
description: Meat from domesticated pigs, used in various global cuisines.

name: Beef Sirloin
description: Tender beef cut from the rear end, often grilled or roasted.

name: Shrimp
description: Small shellfish with sweet, tender meat, used in various seafood dishes.

name: Squid
description: Cephalopod mollusk with a tender texture, used in seafood dishes.

name: Chorizo
description: Spicy sausage made from pork, seasoned with spices like paprika.

name: Shrimp Paste
description: Fermented shrimp condiment, adds a strong salty flavor.

name: Bagoong
description: Fermented shrimp or fish paste used in Filipino cuisine for a salty umami flavor.

name: Onion
description: A staple vegetable with an aromatic flavor, used in various types.

name: Garlic
description: Pungent herb used to add robust flavor, known for health benefits.

name: Bok Choy
description: Chinese cabbage with a mild flavor, used in stir-fries and soups.

name: Eggplant
description: Purple vegetable with a spongy texture, absorbs flavors well.

name: String Beans
description: Crunchy beans, also known as green beans, add freshness to dishes.

name: Green Onions
description: Mild-flavored onions used as a garnish or in salads.

name: Kangkong
description: Water spinach with a slightly sweet flavor, used in Southeast Asian cuisine.

name: Potatoes
description: Starchy tubers used in various dishes, can be boiled, baked, mashed, or fried.

name: Carrots
description: Sweet root vegetables with a crunchy texture, used in both raw and cooked dishes.

name: Green Peas
description: Small, round vegetables with a sweet flavor and tender texture, used in soups and stews.

name: Soy Sauce
description: Fermented condiment made from soybeans and wheat, adds salty umami flavor.

name: Vinegar
description: Acidic liquid used for cooking and pickling, adds tanginess.

name: Fish Sauce
description: Fermented fish condiment, adds salty umami flavor, especially in Southeast Asian cuisine.

name: Oyster Sauce
description: Savory sauce made from oyster extracts, adds umami flavor.

name: Tomato Sauce
description: Cooked sauce from tomatoes, used as a base in dishes like pasta and stews.

name: Pancit Malabon Sauce
description: Rich sauce with shrimp and spices, used to coat Pancit Malabon noodles.

name: Rice
description: Staple grain used as a base or side dish in many meals.

name: Pancit Malabon Noodles
description: Thick rice noodles used in Pancit Malabon, a Filipino noodle dish.

name: Pancit Canton Noodles
description: Thin egg noodles used in Pancit Canton, a Filipino stir-fried noodle dish.

name: Water
description: Fundamental liquid used to hydrate ingredients and adjust dish consistency.

name: Dried Taro Leaves
description: Used in cooking for unique flavor and texture, often rehydrated.

name: Tamarind Paste
description: Tangy paste from tamarind pods, adds sour and slightly sweet flavor.
